description: Don’t be put off by the maze of narrow streets leading to this restaurant in the historic town – once you reach your destination, you’ll enjoy delicious classic recipes from Puglia prepared using top-quality ingredients and full of unmistakeable flavours, all served in a charming dining room with lime and stone walls crowned by a domed ceiling. Everything here, from the bread to the ice-cream, is homemade!
